message.content:
point of view
three-dimensional
art technique
vanishing point
visual perception
angle of view
depth perception
linear perspective
aerial perspective
objective vs subjective

Note: These terms are related to the concept of perspective in various fields such as art, literature, and psychology. Some of them refer to specific techniques used in drawing or painting to create the illusion of depth and three-dimensionality, while others relate to the subjective nature of perception and interpretation.
